*WARNING*

This torrent and all its peers and being tracked by Activision! I got an email from AT&T (my ISP) stating how Activison found out I was downloading this. It appears that they are keeping track of every IP on this torrent, looking them up and sending complaints to the internet providers. Im sure its not just me, but many other people as well. What this also means is that activision could sue you if they wanted. This makes me very sad. Activison is an evil corporation if they have to treat their customers like this. Their income has been skyrocketing for the past few years so I know they aren't running low on money. What this means is that they are willing to sue you and bully you around to keep their pile of money high. What a greedy, pathetic corporation these guys are. Ive always hated them for buying out sierra and shutting down the empire earth servers, but Ididn't expect them to go any lower than that. Use peer guardian so the person who is tracking you doesn't get your IP. If you have any worry at all, don't download this torrent.
